resource_dependency.authAPI: RESTful API for user registration, login, session management, role-based access control
resource_dependency.userDatabaseSchema: Table: users(id UUID PK, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, password_hash TEXT, first_name VARCHAR(100), last_name VARCHAR(100), role ENUM('admin','user'), created_at TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Provide secure user authentication and role-based authorization
static_description: Login form with email and password fields, register link, and remember me checkbox. Registration form with name, email, password, and confirm password fields.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking login submits credentials to authAPI for validation and redirects to dashboard on success or shows error message on failure
Clicking register creates new user account via authAPI and redirects to confirmation page

resource_dependency.searchAPI: RESTful API endpoint for querying domains with filters and sorting parameters
resource_dependency.domainDatabaseSchema: Table: domains(id UUID PK, name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, status ENUM('available','leased','pending_transfer'), price DECIMAL(10,2), tld VARCHAR(10), created_at TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Allow users to search for domains with advanced filtering and sorting capabilities
static_description: Search bar with filter dropdowns below showing TLD options, price range sliders, status checkboxes, and sort order buttons. Results displayed in grid with domain names, prices, and status indicators.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking search button sends query to searchAPI and displays results in real-time
Clicking filter options updates search results dynamically without page reload

resource_dependency.leaseAPI: RESTful API for initiating and managing domain lease transactions
resource_dependency.leaseDatabaseSchema: Table: leases(id UUID PK, domain_id UUID FK, user_id UUID FK, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, term_length INTEGER, total_cost DECIMAL(10,2), status ENUM('active','expired','cancelled'), created_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Enable users to lease domains for selected time periods with pricing discounts
static_description: Domain detail page showing available lease terms as radio buttons with pricing information. Lease summary section showing selected term, total cost, and proceed to checkout button.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting different lease terms updates total cost calculation in real-time
Clicking 'Proceed to Checkout' initiates lease transaction via leaseAPI

resource_dependency.renewalAPI: RESTful API for extending active domain leases
resource_dependency.expirationTracking: Background job checking lease expiration dates daily
resource_dependency.renewalDatabaseSchema: Table: renewals(id UUID PK, lease_id UUID FK, previous_end_date DATE, new_end_date DATE, renewal_cost DECIMAL(10,2), status ENUM('completed','pending_payment'), created_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Allow users to extend their domain leases before expiration with automatic tracking
static_description: User dashboard showing upcoming expirations with renewal buttons. Renewal modal displaying current lease details, extension options, and total cost.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking renewal button opens renewal options modal with pricing breakdown
Confirming renewal processes payment via renewalAPI and extends lease period

resource_dependency.transferAPI: RESTful API for submitting and processing domain transfer requests
resource_dependency.transferDatabaseSchema: Table: transfers(id UUID PK, domain_id UUID FK, from_user_id UUID FK, to_user_id UUID FK, status ENUM('requested','approved','rejected','completed'), request_date TIMESTAMP, completion_date TIMESTAMP, transfer_code VARCHAR(50))

function: Facilitate secure transfer of domain ownership between users with verification steps
static_description: Transfer initiation form requiring recipient email and security code generation. Transfer status tracking panel showing progress through verification steps.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting transfer request generates unique code and sends notification via transferAPI
Recipient approving transfer completes ownership change through transferAPI

resource_dependency.dashboardAPI: RESTful API aggregating user's leased domains and transaction history
resource_dependency.dashboardDatabaseViews: Materialized views for quick retrieval of user-specific domain data
resource_dependency.leasingHistorySchema: View combining leases, renewals, and transfers tables filtered by user_id

function: Provide centralized overview of user's domain portfolio and transaction activities
static_description: Dashboard layout with leased domains grid, upcoming expirations list, recent transactions timeline, and quick action buttons for renewal/transfer.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking domain card navigates to detailed domain information page
Clicking transaction items expands to show full details and related actions

resource_dependency.orderAPI: RESTful API managing all domain-related transactions as orders
resource_dependency.orderDatabaseSchema: Table: orders(id UUID PK, user_id UUID FK, order_type ENUM('lease','renewal','transfer'), item_id UUID, amount DECIMAL(10,2), status ENUM('pending','processing','completed','failed'), created_at TIMESTAMP, completed_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Track and manage all financial transactions related to domain operations
static_description: Order management page with sortable table showing order ID, type, date, amount, and status. Filter controls for date range and status types.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking order row expands to show detailed transaction information and receipt
Filtering by status updates displayed orders in real-time via orderAPI

resource_dependency.paymentAPI: Integration with Stripe/PayPal for processing payments
resource_dependency.paymentDatabaseSchema: Table: payments(id UUID PK, order_id UUID FK, amount DECIMAL(10,2), method ENUM('credit_card','paypal','bank_transfer'), status ENUM('pending','success','failed','refunded'), transaction_id VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP)

function: Handle secure payment processing for all domain transactions with multiple payment options
static_description: Checkout page with payment method selection cards, secure payment form fields, order summary sidebar, and complete purchase button.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting payment method reveals corresponding input fields and processes payment via paymentAPI
Completing payment updates order status and redirects to confirmation page

resource_dependency.adminAPI: RESTful API providing CRUD operations for user and domain management
resource_dependency.adminDatabasePermissions: Role-based permissions restricting admin functions to authorized users only
resource_dependency.inventoryManagementSchema: Extended domain schema with admin-only fields: acquisition_cost, resale_value, notes TEXT

function: Provide administrative interface for managing platform users and domain inventory
static_description: Admin panel with navigation sidebar containing Users, Domains, Orders sections. Main content area showing data grids with bulk action capabilities.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking user/domain rows enables editing/deletion via adminAPI with appropriate permissions check
Using bulk action checkboxes allows simultaneous operations on multiple records

resource_dependency.colorPalette: Old lace (#FDF5E6) for background, rosy brown (#BC8F8F) for component accents and borders
resource_dependency.responsiveFramework: CSS media queries and flexbox/grid for mobile-first responsive design
resource_dependency.uiComponentLibrary: Custom styled components following consistent color scheme and typography

function: Ensure consistent visual design across all devices with specified color palette
static_description: Website featuring old lace background with rosy brown borders, buttons, and accent elements. Responsive grid layouts adapting to screen sizes with touch-friendly controls.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts fluidly between desktop, tablet, and mobile views maintaining usability
Interactive elements show rosy brown highlight states for better user feedback

resource_dependency.apiDocumentation: OpenAPI/Swagger specification defining all endpoints, request/response formats, and authentication methods
resource_dependency.errorHandling: Standardized JSON error responses with HTTP status codes and descriptive messages

function: Provide comprehensive backend services supporting all frontend data requirements
static_description: Backend structure exposing documented API endpoints grouped by resource type. Consistent response formats including pagination for list endpoints.

interaction_and_states.description: Frontend calls trigger corresponding API endpoints returning structured JSON data or appropriate error responses

resource_dependency.databaseConnection: PostgreSQL connection using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
resource_dependency.migrationScripts: SQL migration files for creating initial database schema and sample data
resource_dependency.connectionPooling: Database connection pooling configuration for efficient resource usage

function: Establish persistent database connectivity for storing and retrieving application data
static_description: Backend service initializing PostgreSQL connection pool at startup using provided environment variables. Connection health monitoring endpoints for operational visibility.

interaction_and_states.description: Application initializes database connection pool and validates connectivity before serving requests

resource_dependency.packageJsonTemplate: { "scripts": { "install:all": "npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install", "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev --prefix backend\" \"npm run dev --prefix frontend\"" } }
resource_dependency.dependencyManagement: Separate package.json files for frontend and backend with shared devDependencies where appropriate
resource_dependency.concurrentExecution: Concurrently library for running multiple development servers simultaneously

function: Streamline development workflow with unified installation and execution commands
static_description: Root package.json file containing convenience scripts for installing dependencies and starting development servers for both frontend and backend.

interaction_and_states.description: Running 'npm run install:all' executes dependency installation across both projects sequentially
Running 'npm run dev' launches both frontend and backend development servers concurrently

resource_dependency.domainInfoAPI: RESTful API endpoint returning comprehensive domain metadata and specifications
resource_dependency.domainDetailsSchema: Extended domain table with fields: description TEXT, dns_records JSONB, whois_info JSONB, seo_metrics JSONB

function: Display detailed technical and ownership information about individual domains
static_description: Domain information page organized in tabbed sections showing technical specifications, DNS records, SEO metrics, and ownership history with expandable detail views.

interaction_and_states.description: Switching tabs loads corresponding domain information categories via domainInfoAPI
Expanding detail rows reveals additional technical information without page refresh

resource_dependency.notificationAPI: Webhook-based notification system sending alerts via email and in-app notifications
resource_dependency.notificationDatabaseSchema: Table: notifications(id UUID PK, user_id UUID FK, type ENUM('lease_expiration','transaction_update','transfer_request'), message TEXT, read BOOLEAN DEFAULT false, created_at TIMESTAMP)
resource_dependency.notificationTriggers: Automated events for lease expirations (7/3/1 days prior), transaction completions, and transfer approvals

function: Keep users informed about important domain-related events and transaction statuses
static_description: Notification bell icon in header showing unread count. Dropdown panel listing recent notifications with timestamps and mark-as-read controls. Dedicated notifications page for full history.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking notification bell toggles visibility of notification dropdown panel
Clicking individual notifications marks them as read and navigates to relevant transaction page
